title: Stimulus
description: Stimulus presented to a subject in the study

stimulusType.title: Stimulus Type
stimulusType.description: The type/modality of the stimulus presented

stimulusDescription.title: Stimulus Description
stimulusDescription.description: Optional additional description of the stimulus

UUID.title: Stimulus ID
UUID.description: Unique identifier of this Stimulus object, generated by repository

label.title: Stimulus Label
label.description: User-generated label for this Stimulus object, if not provided defaults to UUID
